:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''450''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_504.html Product page] (CN) "2050500697" and "1613" is silkscreened on the main board. ===Overview=== *Supports 802.11ac - The next generation of Wi-Fi network *2.4GHz band: 450Mbps; 5GHz band: 1733Mbps 4x4 MIMO *Privacy with Guest Network Access provides secure Wi-Fi :access for guests sharing your home or office network *IP-based Bandwidth Control makes it easier for you to manage :the bandwidth of individual devices connected to the router ===News=== *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2015/06/01-0 ''News Cascade'' on '''Qualcomm'''] *[https://www.qualcomm.com/products/vive/chipsets ''Vive Chipsets'' on '''Qualcomm'''] ===Reviews=== *[http://upsangel.com/router-2/tplink-wdr8500-crack-n-test/ ''TP-LINK WDR8500 AC2200 MU-MIMO'' on '''UpsAngel'''] (PCB images) ===See also=== :[[TP-LINK]] • [http://www.tp-link.com.cn/product_list_wirelessrouter.html Wireless Router] (CN) *[[TP-LINK TL-WDR5630]] -
